Events that occurred on 29 April.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1916 - Voice actor William Squire is born.
1926 - Voice actor Leonard Fenton is born.
1945 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 98a.
1946 - Tolkien's biographer Humphrey Carpenter is born.
1992 - Stephen Oliver dies.
2011 - J.R.R. Tolkien's Double Worlds and Creative Process is published.
